content.raw:
Atlas drifts quite a bit when just sitting in the vehicle.  This was not seen in 2.6.1, but is seen in the nightly build.  It drifts fast enough that the robot will fall over or drift out in about 1 minute.  It can be reproduced by teleporting in to the vehicle in vrc_task_1.  Note that this is different than the minor issue where the robot's left foot sometime catches when teleporting.

```
#!shell

rostopic pub --once /drc_world/robot_enter_car geometry_msgs/Pose '{}'
rostopic pub -1 /atlas/mode std_msgs/String -- nominal

```
